Articles.Content:
Lets not throw ZRM under the bus here, something probably popped up. He'll be back when he has time

Perhaps he will (and I hope he does), but we don't want to wait around if he's not coming back.

I think it's best to wait a bit for ZRM, he is the one that knows what he was doing. If you trade him, the new guy needs to figure out where ZRM actually was, which will result in... an even more pushed back release.

And who knows! maybe he's working hardcore on it right now to bring us an amazing Christmas or new years present!

Anyway.. ZRM said the earliest he could get to continue working on it was 6 December. could! so maybe his commitments turned out to take a little longer. who knows... only he does.

Good luck to both Helldiver and ZRM. I'll be waiting until the glorious day we will be able to free ourselves in the endless space with that awesome shuttle!

Very glad to see that this is still a WIP. I'm willing to wait for such an awesome little ship.

Keep up the fine work, guys!
I bet you that this shuttle is going to make The daily Kerbal.
This is severely annoying to me,I have been waiting for this doggone thing,but it has to take forever...
Are you guys even developing this anymore??

Are you guys even developing this anymore??

Yes, they're still developing it, it's just on hold while we wait for ZRM to go on his break from his college classes.

Yes, they're still developing it, it's just on hold while we wait for ZRM to go on his break from his college classes.

I see...but they never post any updates or dev releases,so I cannot tell easily.

Looking at ZRM's profile you can see that he has been online on the 23th, but he hasn't posted.

So hes back, but is he continuing to work on the shuttle?

I see...but they never post any updates or dev releases,so I cannot tell easily.

helldiver cant because he is waiting on ZRM. and ZRM is either still away or is not ready to post an update.

Looking at ZRM's profile you can see that he has been online on the 23th, but he hasn't posted.

So hes back, but is he continuing to work on the shuttle?

It's the 23d,not 23st,that sounds like "twentythirst".Also,I do believe that he hasn't been online lately,but couldn't he just hand development over to someone with time on their hands?
Keep in mind ZRM probably has family and may may be spending the holidays with them.

Okay guys, let's leave ZRM alone please.

What he is and isn't up to is of his concerns and his concerns only. This said, I'd like if we could all move on from this and stop discussing what he could be up to, we do not want to be spreading rumors on anyone.

Future posts on this may be deleted without any other warnings.

Thanks all for your cooperation.

Okay guys, let's leave ZRM alone please.

What he is and isn't up to is of his concerns and his concerns only. This said, I'd like if we could all move on from this and stop discussing what he could be up to, we do not want to be spreading rumors on anyone.

Future posts on this may be deleted without any other warnings.

Thanks all for your cooperation.

This thread is borderline creepy now.

This thread is borderline creepy now.

For that matter, so is stupid_chris's avatar

For that matter, so is stupid_chris's avatar

what the is that .gif from any way?

what the is that .gif from any way?

That'S from Adventure Time. Now I'd appreciate if we would keep on topic, thanks.
Happy 2014 for the devs! Hope you are still fine on track on this neat ship!
What is the curse of Kerbal Shuttles...? All who try, are doomed to fail.
this one seemed so promiseing.

this one seemed so promiseing.

it is still going.....

although ZRM needs to be found
ZRM last on the forums 30.12.13, and before that fairly regularly. Helldiver if he hasnt contacted you I would go with other options its a crying shame to let such a promising project stagnate.
As sad as it is, I'm gonna call it here that this project is pretty much dead.

What is the curse of Kerbal Shuttles...? All who try, are doomed to fail.

Except for Bobcat's Buran. And Tiberion's Shuttle Booster System. And the Component Space Shuttle, if recent posts are to be believed. So it's actually only this mod that is dead-ish, and ZRM might just have been gobbled up by RL for the time - if we're lucky. He might also have lost interest in this project, but I wouldn't think so.
I'm still waiting on that FAR compatible shuttle lol
